name: openpanel
description: OpenPanel is a self-hosted control panel for managing web hosting environments. It supports domain management, email, databases, and integrates with web servers, ideal for self-hosted VPS setups.
features: Domain management: Add, configure, and manage multiple domains with DNS settings and SSL certificate automation.
Email hosting: Create email accounts, forwarders, and manage mailboxes with webmail access for hosted domains.
Database administration: Create and manage MySQL and PostgreSQL databases with phpMyAdmin and Adminer integration.
File manager: Upload, edit, and organize website files through a web-based file browser with permissions control.
Web server control: Configure Nginx or Apache settings, manage virtual hosts, and control server processes.
User accounts: Create isolated hosting accounts with resource limits and separate file system access for multi-tenant hosting.
Backup management: Schedule automatic backups of websites, databases, and email with one-click restoration.
Resource monitoring: Track disk usage, bandwidth consumption, and server performance metrics per account and globally.
